author: The Associated Press
title: More deaths, no benefit from malaria drug in VA virus study
description: The research has not been reviewed by other scientists but is the largest look so far of hydroxychloroquine with or without an antibiotic for COVID-19.
content: A malaria drug widely touted by President Donald Trump for treating the new coronavirus showed no benefit in a large analysis of its use in U.S. veterans hospitals. There were more deaths among those given hydroxychloroquine versus standard care, researchers … [+2254 chars]
